Title: Brand Specialist
RoleDescription: CONSUMER ACTIVATION PROJECTSYou'll support the development of top-notch consumer activations leveraging key marketing initiatives, following consumer activation principles, and adhering to brand standards. Youll work cross-functionally with key stakeholders in the Marketing and Sales team to support a full 360-degree approach.
